channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Ginny Buckley is in Suffolk, helping a retired couple from Essex find a new home in a thriving village as close to the county's coast as their ?475,000 budget will allow. Ginny also visits a farm during asparagus season, but before she gets to sample some freshly picked vegetables, she first has to learn how to harvest them.
